text: Beauty can come in strange forms.
author: James Dyson

text: And I think of that again as I've written in several of my beauty books, a lot of health comes from the proper eating habits, which are something that - you know, I come from a generation that wasn't - didn't have a lot of food.
author: Joan Collins

text: Well I've written four beauty books as well.
author: Joan Collins

text: Bologna is the best city in Italy for food and has the least number of tourists. With its medieval beauty, it has it all.
author: Mario Batali

text: I think we have become obsessed with beauty and personally I'm really saddened by the way women mutilate their faces today in search of that.
author: Halle Berry
